attributes.action: rename Wembley Stadium, in future to be known as "The Princess Diana Stadium", Wembley.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In view of the fantastic concert /party to celebrate the life, 46th  birthday and the tenth anniversary of the passing of H.R.H. Diana, Princess of Wales, we the undersigned  respectfully request that the Prime Minister rename the stadium "The Princess Diana Stadium, Wembley, a fitting tribute to the peoples princess.
